column5: Hi Folks,  I am new to this board and was wondering if anyone can share some information about Mississaga Lake which is located north of the town of Buckhorn. What type of fish are in the lake? Is there a public launch suitable to launch a 20' bass boat? Is there a lot of fishing pressure and boat traffic? Thanks in advance
i cant help you out with the lake but welcome to the board and good luck with your fishing ....  why not be the first to give a detailed report of how the lake is ...?
